title.narrative: 2018-2020 ED1-DEMAND FOR PRE-SCHOOL & PRIMARY EDUCATION SERVICES

description.narrative: By 2019, the Central African education sector has a model of interventions aimed at removing the barriers to educational demand at the pre-school and primary levels, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, children of pre-primary and primary age (girls and boys), and especially those living in the most disadvantaged areas, complete the relevant cycle for their age.
